content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to offer 350 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than I'm looking for. I'm aiming for a price closer to 700 Euro per month. Is that within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 700 Euro is too high for me. I can offer 500 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 500 Euro is still below my expectations. I'm willing to consider a price around 650 Euro per month. Is this more acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can meet you in the middle. How about 575 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 575 Euro is closer to my asking price, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. How about 625 Euro per month? That would be a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I feel like we are not close enough to an agreement. I need to consider my budget.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, Yi-Nuo. If you need more time to consider your budget, that's perfectly fine. We can revisit the negotiation at a later time. Thank you for your time today.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your understanding. Let's continue the negotiation another time.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo. Please let me know when you're ready to discuss the terms further. Have a nice day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
